title: Armageddon

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Turn the ground around a player's house to magma, causing all players visiting them to scramble around.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- All players who visit your target will, at random, target another visitor with their ability.
- If only one player visits your target, they will become doused.
- If the Apocalypse dies, you will become the Apocalypse.

desc:
Post 345
*All that others walk around is your battlefield.*
Conversion Immune
Redirect Immune
